actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department; OMB.

official_title: A joint resolution to establish reciprocal entrance fees for Canadian citizens entering Glacier National Park in connection with the fiftieth anniversary of the Waterton-Glacier International Peace Park.

summary.text: Suspends the entrance fees for Canadian citizens entering Glacier National Park in Montana beginning with the date of enactment of this Act and ending December 31, 1982.

titles.title: A joint resolution to establish reciprocal entrance fees for Canadian citizens entering Glacier National Park in connection with the fiftieth anniversary of the Waterton-Glacier International Peace Park.
